forgot_password_page.title: Forgot your password?
forgot_password_page.no_problem_give_your_email: No problem, it happens! Just give us your email address and we'll send you a reset link.
forgot_password_page.label: E-mail address

email_sent_page.title: An email is on its way.
email_sent_page.message: Click the link in your email to reset your password.

new_password_page.title: Hi Jess! Forgot your password?
new_password_page.body_message_one: No problem it happens! If you click the link below you can pick a new one.
new_password_page.body_message_two: If you didn't request a password change please get in touch with us.

success_change_page.title: Success!
success_change_page.message: Your password has been changed. We are looking forward to seeing you again soon.
